music.desc:
A happy theme, suitable to be used as title screen music.
http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-nc-nd/3.0/

Music composed, produced and published by MetalRenard Music.
http://metalrenardmusic.com
http://facebook.com/metalrenardmusic
music.name: Title Theme Happy

actor.desc: All weapons are stored in this actor. It represents the graphical display for weapons. All the actual code for what projectiles are being fired is contained in the "Gun Firing" behavior attached to the "Jumper" actor.
actor.name: Weapon
